definition: the physical object that is the product of a newspaper publisher, cover with wallpaper
details:
noun
- the physical object that is the product of a newspaper publisher
= example: the physical object that is the product of a newspaper publisher
= synonyms: newspaper
- a medium for written communication
= example: a medium for written communication
- a daily or weekly publication on folded sheets
= synonyms: newspaper
- a scholarly article describing the results of observations or stating hypotheses
= example: a scholarly article describing the results of observations or stating hypotheses
- an essay (especially one written as an assignment)
= synonyms: composition
- a business firm that publishes newspapers
= example: a business firm that publishes newspapers
= synonyms: newspaper publisher
- a material made of cellulose pulp derived mainly from wood or rags or certain grasses
verb
- cover with wallpaper
= synonyms: wallpaper
- cover with paper
= example: cover with paper
